name: 咲耶
text:
（ふぅ……
もう１時間は経つな……）
trans:
(Hmm...
An hour has already passed, huh...)

name: 恋鐘
text: 待ち時間、結構長かね～
trans: We've been waiting for a mighty long time～

name: 咲耶
text:
きっと準備に時間がかかっているんだよ
仕方がないさ
trans:
The preparations must be a lot of work.
It can't be helped.

name: 恋鐘
text: ちょっと退屈してきたばい
trans: I'm kinda gettin' bored...

name: 結華
text: う～ん。これだけ長いのは珍しいよね
trans:
Hmm. It sure is taking a lot longer than normal,
that's for sure.

name: 霧子
text: ……何か……あったのかな……
trans: ...I wonder... if something happened...

name: 結華
text:
ねー、心配になっちゃうよねーきりりん
早いとこ始まってくんないかな～
trans:
Right...? I'm getting worried too, Kiririn!
I hope we'll be starting soon～

name: 摩美々
text: 私は別にいいですケドー
trans: I don't really mind, though～

name: 恋鐘
text:
摩美々も、もっとこっち寄って来んね
おしゃべりするたいー！
trans:
Mamimi, could 'ya come a lil closer?
Let's do some talkin'!

name: 摩美々
text: 今、ネイルで忙しいんでー
trans: Sorry, I'm busy with my nails at the moment～

name: 恋鐘
text: むーっ！　摩美々、冷たかー！
trans: Hmph! Mamimi, you're so cold!

name: 咲耶
text:
摩美々はいつもオシャレだね
良かったら、ネイルを近くで見せてくれないかい？
trans:
You're as fashionable as always, Mamimi.
Would it be okay if I watch you up close?

name: 摩美々
text: どうぞー
trans: Go ahead～

name: 咲耶
text: ありがとう
trans: Thanks.

name: 咲耶
text:
これはすごいな……
摩美々はとっても器用なんだね
trans:
This really is something...
You're quite skilled at this, Mamimi.

name: 結華
text:
どれどれ……
おっ、本当だ～まみみん気合入ってんね
trans:
Let me take a peek... Oh, you're right~!
You're really getting into it, Mamimi!

name: 霧子
text: わぁ……すごいです……
trans: Wow... It's pretty...

name: 摩美々
text: まぁ、女の子だしー
trans: I am a girl, after all～

name: 恋鐘
text: どれどれ～うちにも見せんね！
trans: Well now～ lemme have a look too!

name: 恋鐘
text:
……か、かわいか～！
爪がキラキラしとるたい！
trans:
...S-So cute～!
Your nails are super sparkly!

name: 摩美々
text: まぁ、デコるのは楽しいからねー
trans: Well, it is fun decorating my nails, so～

name: 恋鐘
text: はぁ～すごかね～
trans: Ahh～ It's mighty fine～!

name: 咲耶
text: フフ……
trans: Hehe...

name: 恋鐘
text: 咲耶も、こげなことしたりすると？
trans: Ya interested in this too, Sakuya?

name: 咲耶
text: え？　いや……私には合わないんじゃないかな
trans: Huh? Well... It wouldn't really match me, I'd say.

name: 咲耶
text:
恋鐘や摩美々のように
可愛い女の子が似合う物だからね
trans:
These things are better suited for cute girls,
like you and Mamimi.

name: 恋鐘
text:
似合うとか似合わないとか
決めつけるの、なんかもったいなかよ！
trans:
If you're stuck worryin' 'bout things like that,
You're wasting a good opportunity, I'd say!

name: 摩美々
text: 試しに１度、やってみたらー？
trans: Do you want to do them once, just to try～?

name: 恋鐘
text: それがよか！
trans: That's a good idea!

name: 恋鐘
text: ついでにうちも一緒にネイルしたか～
trans:
And while you're at it, I'd love to get my nails
done too!

name: 霧子
text: ふふ……うん……♪
trans: Fufu... Yep...♪

name: 咲耶
text:
フフフ。みんながそこまで言うのなら
挑戦してみようかな……
trans:
Hahaha. If everyone is looking forward to it that
much, perhaps I will give it a shot...

name: 恋鐘
text: 咲耶なら絶対似合うばい！
trans: I reckon it'd fit ya well, Sakuya!

name: 摩美々
text: なんならぁ、私がやってあげてもいいケドー
trans: If you'd like, I could do your nails for you, I guess～

name: 咲耶
text:
本当かい？　それじゃあ、お言葉に甘えて
お願いしようかな
trans:
Really? In that case,
I may take you up on the offer.

name: 結華
text:
お、さくやん初ネイル？
いいねいいね！　楽しそうじゃん
trans:
Oh, Sakuyan's first manicure?
Neato! Sounds like fun!

name: 霧子
text: うん。きっと似合う……
trans: Yep. I'm sure it'll match...

name: 恋鐘
text:
そういえば、結華もおしゃれさんやし
ネイルば詳しいんかね？
trans:
Oh right, Yuika is pretty fashionable too!
You know your stuff too, don'tcha?

name: 結華
text:
おしゃれさんなんてそんなー
……まぁ、たしなみ程度には？
trans:
Calling me fashionable is an exaggeration～!
...Well, I'm about average, maybe?

name: 霧子
text: わたしも、勉強してみたいな……
trans: I'd also love to learn more too...

name: 結華
text: おっ、きりりん興味ある？
trans: Oh, this piques your interest too, Kiririn?

name: 霧子
text:
うん……
自分でやったことはないんだけど……
trans:
Yes...
Although I've never done it myself...

name: 咲耶
text:
それならネイルの勉強会がてら
休日にみんなで集まらないかい？
trans:
In that case, what if we all meet up for a "nail
study session" during our free time?

name: 結華
text: さくやんそれ名案～！
trans: I'm on board with that, Sakuyan～!

name: 恋鐘
text:
楽しそうたい！
今度の休み、絶対やるけんね！
trans:
Sounds mighty fun!
We hafta do it this comin' break!

name: 恋鐘
text: 約束たい！
trans: It's a promise!

name: 恋鐘
text:
ちょうどいいしうちに来んね
みんなを招待したかばい
trans:
It's the perfect opportunity to come over
to my place too, so let's do it there!

name: 咲耶
text: いいのかい？　それじゃあお言葉に甘えようかな
trans:
Is that alright? Well then, we'll take you up on
that.

name: 結華
text: こがたんの家か！　楽しみだなぁ
trans: Kogatan's house, huh! I'm getting excited!

name: 霧子
text:
ありがとう恋鐘ちゃん
何でもお手伝い……するから……
trans:
Thank you, Kogane-chan.
I'll help you out... in whichever way I can...

name: 摩美々
text: 私は別にどこでもいいんでー
trans: I'm fine with anywhere～

name: 咲耶
text: フフ、これは今度の休みが楽しみだね
trans: Hehe, I'm looking forward to our next break now.
